allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add undo system, breadboard insertion, and UI improvements \(v6.3.0-6.6.0\)

Features:
- Undo system with Ctrl+Z and toolbar button
- Breadboard component insertion with auto-snap to pins
- Smart two-pin snapping for LEDs and resistors
- Group movement for breadboard-inserted components
- Circuit connectivity through breadboard nets

Fixes:
- Rotation pivot point now uses visual center
- Flip transformations preserve center position
- Pin positions accurate after rotation/flip
- Snapping works correctly with all transformations

UI improvements:
- Property card: reduced width, repositioned
- LED color selector changed to dropdown
- Resistor value selector with common ohm values
- Removed category display from property card

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update package-lock.json for CI compatibility

Regenerated to fix npm ci failures on GitHub Actions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem ''G:\\AAA设计\\AI coding\\Big Arduino'' | Select-Object Name")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem ''G:\\AAA设计\\AI coding\\Big Arduino\\big-arduino-app\\public'' | Select-Object Name")
